title: Network State Genesis
name: Network State Genesis
description: Network State Genesis. Planetary Council. Galactic Federation. New New World Order. This NFT represents the membership and agreement with the two fundamental values: LIFE and GRAVITY.
genesis_comment: Google Doc, saved as PDF, uploaded to IPFS, saved to smart contract AND token URI AND Etherscan verified code: 'Preserving consciousness of the moment'
image_brief_comment: At this URL should be instructions about the design brief. We intend that the next version will be a `next level` collabo-hacking-ration
image_latest_comment: Maybe ERC for evolving designs? Current design is the best what we could get given limited time and resources. Hoping the `next level` version will meet and exceed the expectations.
